Class Graviton

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Graviton
public class Graviton
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines one particle's contribution to the total gravitational field.

Field Summary
 Part id
          The reference of the current particle.
 double m
          The mass of the current particle
 Vector3 pos
          The position of the current particle

          This constructor simply creates a new Graviton.

Field Detail

pos

public Vector3 pos
The position of the current particle

m

public double m
The mass of the current particle

id

public Part id
The reference of the current particle. Used to id the particle who created the field, and avoid some DivideByZero errors.
Constructor Detail

Graviton

public Graviton(Vector3 p,
                double mass,
                Part identity)
This constructor simply creates a new Graviton.
Parameters:
p - The position of the particle.
mass - The particles mass.
identity - The reference to the current particle.
